summary: REQ-9 is implemented (document title updated). REQ-8 is partially implemented in code (header with correct URL and alt), but the actual logo file addition is not shown in the diff. REQ-7 and the footer-related parts of REQ-7/REQ-8 cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all visible company/brand name text across the home page from “SensorTech Electric” to “Electric Light” (including About heading, Footer brand text, and footer copyright line with current year).
missing_requirements.reason: Only the header brand text change to “Electric Light” is visible in the provided App.tsx snippet; the About heading and footer content are not shown in the truncated diff, so the full set of required text updates cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded logo file Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png under frontend/public/assets/generated so it is available at /assets/generated/Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff reports no added files, and there is no evidence that the PNG asset was added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the logo next to the company name in both the header and the footer.
missing_requirements.reason: Header logo usage is shown, but footer logo usage is not visible in the truncated App.tsx snippet, so the footer portion cannot be verified.
